In this website, we will publish regular progress updates of the ChemNLP project under the umbrella of the [OpenBioML collective research laboratory](https://openbioml.org/#mission).


# Team 

<div style="text-align: left"> 
We are an open science project and are proud to about the many talented contributors in our community. 

Our work is lead by the core team, which consists of (in alphabetical order):

- Andrew White (@whitead)
- Beth Connolly (@bethanyconnolly, focus on benchmarking)
- Jack Butler (@jackapbutler, focus on model code) 
- Kevin Maik Jablonka (@kjappelbaum, focus on data and benchmarking)
- Mark Worrall (@maw501, focus in model code)
- Michael Pieler (@MicPie)
- Mohamed (@lemo, focus on data)
</div>
